docs.title: Identity
docs.content: Name: Meftah Zineb. Computer science and artificial intelligence student. Future AI engineer with strong focus on robotics, reinforcement learning, deep learning, and backend systems. Portfolio owner: zinebmeftah.github.io.

docs.title: Profile Overview
docs.content: Zineb is a highly technical AI-oriented developer who designs and implements intelligent systems end-to-end. Her work combines LLMs, reinforcement learning, computer vision, graph algorithms, and backend platforms. She emphasizes real-world usability, reproducibility, and deployment.

docs.title: Career Goal
docs.content: Seeking an internship in Artificial Intelligence or software engineering, ideally involving robotics, applied AI, or intelligent backend systems. Interested in roles that mix research thinking with practical implementation.

docs.title: Education – ENSIA
docs.content: ENSIA (Algeria): Artificial Intelligence Engineering degree. First and second years validated. Period: 2022–June 2024. Strong foundation in algorithms, AI, mathematics, and engineering.

docs.title: Education – Université d’Avignon
docs.content: Université d’Avignon (CERI), France. Data Science / Computer Science (L3). Period: September 2024 – Present. Excellent academic results.

docs.title: Academic Background
docs.content: Baccalauréat Scientifique obtained in Algeria with mention Excellent (average 17.82). Strong background in mathematics, logic, and scientific reasoning.

docs.title: AI Core Skills
docs.content: Large Language Models, prompt engineering, fine-tuning strategies, synthetic data generation, reinforcement learning, computer vision, NLP, graph search, and optimization.

docs.title: AI Tools & Frameworks
docs.content: PyTorch, Hugging Face (models, datasets, Spaces), OpenAI API, TensorFlow.js, Gradio, NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib.

docs.title: Robotics & Reinforcement Learning
docs.content: Experience with robotic manipulation, policy training, diffusion-based control, simulation environments, and vision-guided navigation. Uses LeRobot, PushT, grid-world simulations, and A* pathfinding.

docs.title: Backend Development
docs.content: Backend systems built using Node.js, NestJS, PHP, Python, REST APIs. Experience with authentication, dashboards, multi-entity databases, and clean architecture.

docs.title: Web & Interactive Systems
docs.content: Frontend and interactive development using JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas, React, Next.js, CSS, Bootstrap. Builds simulations, dashboards, and AI-powered interfaces.

docs.title: Programming Languages
docs.content: Python, C++, Java, JavaScript, PHP, SQL, Bash. Strong object-oriented and algorithmic thinking.

docs.title: Project – LeRobot PushT Trainer
docs.content: Web application to train, evaluate, and publish PushT reinforcement learning policies. Includes checkpoint management, visualization, CUDA acceleration, Hugging Face model publishing, and Gradio interface.

docs.title: Project – Robot Vision Simulator
docs.content: Browser-based robot simulator with navigation, pick-and-place, and natural-language commands. Uses COCO-SSD for object detection, A* for pathfinding, and HTML5 Canvas for visualization.

docs.title: Project – AI Website Generator
docs.content: System that generates functional websites from natural language instructions using LLMs and web automation. Focus on end-to-end automation and usability.

docs.title: Project – News Wave
docs.content: AI-powered personalized news aggregator that filters and ranks news based on user interests, delivering real-time updates from multiple sources.

docs.title: Project – AI Product Personalization
docs.content: Platform allowing users to transform ideas into personalized products using AI models, with a transition toward real production.

docs.title: Project – Agricultural Plan Optimization
docs.content: AI system optimizing agricultural production in Algeria using graph search, constraints, and optimization techniques.

docs.title: Project – G-JOBS
docs.content: Smart recruitment platform connecting job seekers and recruiters with filters, messaging, and application tracking.

docs.title: Project – Advanced Search Engine
docs.content: Java-based search engine implementing TF-IDF and BM25 for indexing, ranking, and document retrieval.

docs.title: Project – Restaurant Chain
docs.content: Multi-country restaurant management system handling reservations, staff, stock, and reporting.

docs.title: Project – Road Network Analysis
docs.content: Graph-based analysis of road networks in Avignon, focusing on shortest paths, connectivity, and performance metrics.

docs.title: Leadership – GDSC
docs.content: IT Manager at Google Developer Student Club ENSIA. Organized technical events, hackathons, and mentoring activities.

docs.title: Leadership – AYLP
docs.content: Participant in the Algerian Youth Leadership Program. Developed leadership, communication, and international collaboration skills.

docs.title: Certifications
docs.content: Deep Learning with PyTorch (DataCamp), Responsive Web Design (freeCodeCamp), AYLP Certificate, English proficiency certification.

docs.title: Languages
docs.content: French: B2. English: strong professional level. Arabic: native.

docs.title: Soft Skills
docs.content: Strong autonomy, analytical thinking, leadership, teamwork, and continuous self-learning.

docs.title: Contact
docs.content: Email: zineb.meftah36@gmail.com. LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/zinebmeftah. GitHub: github.com/zineb-hub. Hugging Face: huggingface.co/zino36.

docs.title: Project Ranking Logic
docs.content: When ranking projects, prioritize AI depth, real-world impact, technical complexity, and completeness. Robotics and reinforcement learning projects should generally rank highest, followed by LLM-based systems.

docs.title: Recruiter Context
docs.content:
This portfolio belongs to Meftah Zineb, a computer science and artificial intelligence student targeting AI-oriented internships or alternance positions. Ideal roles include AI Engineer Intern, Applied AI Intern, Robotics / Reinforcement Learning Intern, or Backend Software Intern with strong AI exposure.

Zineb’s profile is differentiated by:
- Strong AI depth beyond basic ML (LLMs, reinforcement learning, computer vision, graph algorithms)
- End-to-end project ownership (from idea → implementation → demo/deployment)
- Ability to combine AI research concepts with practical engineering and usable products

Preferred domains:
- Robotics and reinforcement learning
- Applied AI systems (LLM-based tools, intelligent automation)
- Backend systems that integrate AI models

What to highlight when presenting her profile:
- Robotics and RL projects (LeRobot PushT Trainer, Robot Vision Simulator) should be emphasized first
- LLM-based systems with real use cases come second
- Traditional software projects demonstrate engineering rigor but are secondary

Availability:
- Actively seeking internship or alternance opportunities in AI or software engineering
- Open to research-oriented or product-oriented teams

When answering recruiter-style questions ("Why you?", "What should I look at first?", "Most important project?"):
- Emphasize technical depth, autonomy, and ability to deliver real systems
- Prioritize projects that combine AI complexity with concrete demos
- Avoid generic student descriptions; focus on applied impact and engineering maturity
